coverDescription:
Welcome to my new home!
AsenSokolov.com v3.0
articleInfo:
I’m extremely happy to show you my new Online Home! This is my new website. I spent a lot of time and effort to present my work and myself in the best possible way.

I used the latest design and development techniques in the creation of my website: AngularJS for the visual part and PHP and mySQL for the backend. You will notice the website speed is incredibly fast and everything loads almost instantly. So go ahead and take a look at my Showcase section to get familiar with my awesome projects.

Looking forward to your feedback and comments!

That’s it for now!
Happy browsing :)))
